content: New Batch Announcement: We are excited to announce the commencement of our latest batch for [Class 6th to 10th]. Enroll now to secure your spot!
Exam Preparation Tips: Learn essential strategies and techniques to excel in your upcoming exams. Join our exclusive exam preparation workshop on 20th March!
Holiday Announcement: Please be informed that the institute will remain closed on 24th March on account of Holi. Wishing you a joyful holiday!
Scholarship Opportunities: Avail exciting scholarship opportunities for deserving students. Contact us for more details.
Parent-Teacher Meeting: We invite parents to attend a meeting on March 28th to discuss the progress and performance of their ward.
Career Guidance Seminar: Explore various career options and pathways with our expert counselors specially designed for the 10th class students. Register now for our upcoming seminar!
Mock Test Series: Evaluate your preparation level with our comprehensive mock test series. Enhance your exam readiness!
Special Workshop: Join us for a special workshop on Effective Parenting Strategies conducted by child psychologists. Limited seats available â€“ reserve yours today!
Important Notice: Please note that classes will be suspended on April 1st on account of National Bandh. Regular classes will resume on 2nd April
Student Achievement Celebration: Celebrate the success of our students who have achieved remarkable results in recent exams. Join us for a felicitation ceremony!
Faculty Recruitment: We are hiring experienced and dedicated faculty members for various subjects. Apply now to join our esteemed team!
Feedback Survey: Your feedback is valuable to us! Kindly spare a few moments to complete our feedback survey and help us serve you better.
